00005 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00006 // Are `this' and `other' compatible units ? (Are they associated to the
00007 // same dimension ?)
00008 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00009 bool vcsl_length_unit::compatible_units(vcsl_unit_sptr const& other) const
00010 {
00011   return other->cast_to_length_unit()!=0;
00012 }
